data.name: HuniePop Official Digital Art Collection
data.detailed_description:
The official digital art collection for HuniePop includes all of the concept, in-game and promotional artwork created for the game in high resolution, full source quality and without any logos or watermarks. Among the stunning pieces within this collection are nearly 50 beautifully rendered CG photos, over 20 hand-painted environment backgrounds and each girl's in-game sprite artwork displayed with all of her alternate outfits, hairstyles and expressions. You'll also get all of our vivid promotional art, special backer reward pantings, character profiles, unused content and more.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files. To quickly access these files right-click HuniePop in your Steam library and select "Properties". From there select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.
